title: Jennifer Aniston cuts a chic figure in pinstripe dress as she arrives to Variety's Power of Women
text:
Advertisement

She is always fashionable, no matter the occasion.

And on Friday, Jennifer Aniston did not disappoint as she arrived at Variety's Power of Women event in Los Angeles.

The 50-year-old actress looked incredible in a pinstripe dress with a statement belt as she posed up a storm on the red carpet.

Wow factor: Jennifer Aniston did not disappoint as she arrived at Variety's Power of Women event in Los Angeles on Friday

Gorgeous: The 50-year-old actress looked incredible in a pinstripe dress with a statement belt as she posed up a storm on the red carpet

The Friends star highlighted her slim waist in the calf-length number; the sleeveless black and white striped look had an asymmetrical hem.

Jennifer rocked a chunky black belt with gold hardware and chic Mary Jane pointed heels.

The movie star, who flashed her toned arms and legs in the stylish look, added gold earrings and a delicate necklace.

Jennifer styled her caramel highlighted tresses sleek with slight waves; she painted her pout a pink glossy hue with gold shadow lightly swept on her eyelids.

Movie star: The movie star, who flashed her toned arms and legs in the stylish look, added gold earrings and a delicate necklace

Mariah Carey commanded attention in a glittering black gown that showcased her incredible body.

The Grammy award winning artist, 49, flashed her cleavage in the plunging long-sleeved gown, which had a flared train.

The beautiful blonde songstress styled her glamorous look with diamond rings and soft, cascading waves.

All the right notes: Mariah Carey commanded attention in a glittering black gown that showcased her incredible body

Always time for a selfie: Diane Warren posed up a storm for a photo with Mariah on the red carpet before the duo headed inside

Good ties: Diane, a songwriter, has worked with Mariah on several tunes including her hit song Can't Take That Away (Mariah's Theme)

Natalie Portman and Brie Larson both rocked a red and black hued ensemble for the morning event, although the latter star's look was edgier.

Natalie hit the carpet in a high-neck elbow-length red knitted sweater, which she tucked into high waisted cropped trousers.

The 38-year-old star opted black flats with gold hoop earrings; she rocked curled tresses and minimal makeup.

Gorgeous: Joey King wore a black dress with a flouncy skirt

Chic: Niecy Nash chose a fitted black sequined frock with heels, adding diamond jewels

Statement: Natalie Portman (L) and Brie Larson (R) both opted for red and black hue looks

Flawless: Natalie hit the carpet in an elbow-length red knitted sweater, which she tucked into high waisted cropped trousers

Stunner: Molly Sims slipped on a low cut red frock that featured a pink hue beneath
description: She is always fashionable, no matter the occasion. And on Friday, Jennifer Aniston did not disappoint as she arrived at Variety's Power of Women event in Los Angeles.
